xwikidoc.name: NavigationMenu
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.superadmin
xwikidoc.content: {{include document="RISCOSSPlatformCode.Macros"/}}{{velocity}} ## -*- Mode:Velocity $xwiki.jsx.use("RISCOSSPlatformCode.Create", {"minify" : false}) ## $xwiki.ssx.use("RISCOSSPlatformCode.NavigationMenu") ## ## Needed for the XWiki.RISCOSSPlatform.initializeCreateDialog callback $xwiki.jsx.use("RISCOSSPlatformCode.ShowInDialog") ## #set($mainWikiId = $services.wiki.mainWikiId) ## #set($currentWikiId = $services.wiki.currentWikiId) ## ## ## Get RISCOSS platform configuration information #set($confDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("RISCOSSPlatformCode.RISCOSSConfiguration")) #set($superConf = $confDoc.getObject("RISCOSSPlatformCode.RISCOSSConfiguration")) #set($feedbackURL = $superConf.getProperty("feedbackURL").getValue()) #set($expertFeedbackURL = $superConf.getProperty("expertFeedbackURL").getValue()) #set($privatePageURL = $xwiki.getURL('RISCOSSPlatformCode.PrivatePage')) ## #if($isGuest) ##* **[[$services.localization.render("login")>>$doc.getExternalURL("login")]]** ## JS/CSS of the Github login functionality #set($oauthPublicKey = $superConf.getProperty("oauthPublicKey").getValue()) #if ("$!oauthPublicKey" != '') #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use("RISCOSSPlatformCode.GithubLogin")) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use("RISCOSSPlatformCode.GithubLogin")) [[Connect with Github>>||id="connectGithub"]] | [[$services.localization.render("login")>>$doc.getExternalURL("login")||id="loginlink"]] | [[Register>>RISCOSSPlatformCode.Register||id="registerlink"]]#if("$!feedbackURL" != '') | [[Feedback>>$feedbackURL||class="guestmenuitem"]]#end #end #else## isGuest #if($currentWikiId == 'xwiki' || ($mainWikiId != $currentWikiId)) #set($wikiName = $services.wiki.getById($services.wiki.getCurrentWikiId()).prettyName) #if($hasAdmin) * $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.domain") **$!wikiName** ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.adminUsers")>>RISCOSSPlatformCode.AdminUsers]] ** $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.adminRoles") ** ---- ** [[$services.localization.render("logout")>>$xwiki.getDocument("XWiki.XWikiLogout").getExternalURL("logout")]] #else * **[[$services.localization.render("logout")>>$xwiki.getDocument("XWiki.XWikiLogout").getExternalURL("logout")]] #if("$!feedbackURL" != '') * ** {{html}}Feedback{{/html}} #end * **[[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.githubprojects.projectpage.allprojects")>>Main.WebHome]] * **[[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.githubprojects.privatepage.myprojects")>>RISCOSSPlatformCode.PrivatePage]] * **{{html}}$xwiki.getUserName($context.user){{/html}} #if("$!feedbackURL" != "" && 1!=1) * ** {{html}}User feedback{{/html}} #end #if("$!expertFeedbackURL" != "") {{html}}Expert feedback{{/html}} #end #end #else * **$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.domainManager")** #end ## #if($hasAdmin) #if($currentWikiId == 'xwiki' || ($mainWikiId != $currentWikiId)) #set($layers = $services.query.xwql("SELECT doc.fullName, doc.title FROM Document doc, doc.object(RISCOSSPlatformLayerManagerCode.LayerClass) as layer WHERE doc.space = 'RISCOSSPlatformLayers'").execute()) * $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.layerManager") ** #generateCreateDialogLink({ "space": "RISCOSSPlatformLayers", "template": "RISCOSSPlatformLayerManagerCode.LayerTemplate", "linkLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.layerManager.newLayer"), "dialogTitle": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.layerManager.newLayer"), "fieldLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.layerManager.layerName") }) ** $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.layerManager.newEntity") #foreach($layer in $layers) *** #generateCreateDialogLink({ "space": "RISCOSSPlatformEntities", "template": "${layer[0]}Template", "linkLabel": $layer[1], "dialogTitle": "$services.localization.render('riscossPlatform.layerManager.createEntity.title') $layer[1]", "fieldLabel": "$services.localization.render('riscossPlatform.layerManager.createEntity.entityName', $layer[1])" }) #end ** ---- ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.layerManager.layerIndex")>>RISCOSSPlatformLayers.WebHome]] ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.layerManager.entityIndex")>>RISCOSSPlatformEntities.WebHome]] * $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager") ** #generateCreateDialogLink({ "space": "RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurations", "template": "RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurationManagerCode.RiskConfigurationTemplate", "linkLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.newRiskConfiguration"), "dialogTitle": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.newRiskConfiguration"), "fieldLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.riskConfigurationName") }) ** #generateCreateDialogLink({ "space": "RISCOSSPlatformRiskCategories", "template": "RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurationManagerCode.RiskCategoryTemplate", "linkLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.newRiskCategory"), "dialogTitle": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.newRiskCategory"), "fieldLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.riskCategoryName") }) ** ---- ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.riskConfigurationIndex")>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskConfigurations.WebHome]] ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.riskConfigurationManager.riskCategoryIndex")>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskCategories.WebHome]] * Risk Analysis ** [[New risk analysis session>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskAnalysisManagerCode.ConfigureAnalysis]] ## ** #generateCustomCreateDialogLink({ ## "action": "$xwiki.getURL('RISCOSSPlatformRiskAnalysisManagerCode.SetRiskAnalysisSessionData')", ## "space": "RISCOSSPlatformRiskAnalysisSessions", ## "linkLabel": "New risk analysis session", ## "dialogTitle": "New risk analysis session", ## "fieldLabel": "Session name" ## }) ** ---- ** [[Risk analysis sessions>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskAnalysisSessions.WebHome]] * Model manager ** #generateCreateDialogLink({ "space": "RISCOSSPlatformRiskModels", "template": "RISCOSSPlatformModelManagerCode.RiskModelTemplate", "linkLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.modelManager.newRiskModel"), "dialogTitle": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.modelManager.newRiskModel"), "fieldLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.modelManager.riskModelName") }) ** #generateCreateDialogLink({ "space": "RISCOSSPlatformGoalModels", "template": "RISCOSSPlatformModelManagerCode.GoalModelTemplate", "linkLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.modelManager.newGoalModel"), "dialogTitle": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.modelManager.newGoalModel"), "fieldLabel": $services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.modelManager.goalModelName") }) ** ---- ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.modelManager.riskModelIndex")>>RISCOSSPlatformRiskModels.WebHome]] ** [[$services.localization.render("riscossPlatform.modelManager.goalModelIndex")>>RISCOSSPlatformGoalModels.WebHome]] #end #end #end {{/velocity}} (((

use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki
